description:
Hozuki takes his young charges on a tour of a very sexy part of hell. Later, the Great King Enma hurts his back and Hozuki decides to deal with it in his own way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les hommes, les femmes et les Grands Enfers - Techniques d’acunpuncture et miroir Jôhari
Man and Woman and Mortal Hell / Hell-Style Acupuncture and Moxibustion Techniques: How-To Use the Johari Mirror
Otoko to Onna to Shugou Jigoku / Jigokushiki Shinkyuujutsu to Jouhari Camera no Tsukaikata
男と女と衆合地獄 / 地獄式鍼灸術と浄玻璃鏡[じょうはりカメラ]の使い方
